extension.name: One Page
extension.author: Joomlabamboo
extension.description:
Onepage One page is a simple scrolling design based on our popular Responsive template. It's a single page designed to give you a starting point to create your own one page scrolling masterpiece.

A simple Joomla theme that scales effortlessly on any device.

field.name: jblogotype
field.label: Logo Type
field.description: This setting determines the type of logo you would like to use. Select no logo in order to disable all template logo output and display your logo in a module elsewhere ont he page.

field.name: logotext
field.label: Logo Text
field.description: Enter the text for your logo

field.name: tagline_enable
field.label: Enable tagline
field.description: This setting enables tagline option

field.name: tagline
field.default: A simple scrolling one page responsive design
field.label: Tagline
field.description: Enter the tagline that sits underneath your logo. The left and top offsets of the tagline are controlled in the Theme Magic settings.

field.name: logoalign
field.label: Logo Alignment
field.description: This setting determines the positioning of the logo.

field.name: logoFont
field.label: Logo Font Family
field.description: Sets the font used for the logo

option.value: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

field.option: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

option.value: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.option: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.name: logoFont_custom
field.label: Google Font - Logo
field.description: Enter the google font you want to use on your site here. If the font name contains spaces just add the space as per the way it is described in the google font directory eg Source Sans pro

field.name: menualign
field.label: Menu Alignment
field.description: This setting determines the alignment of the menu.

field.name: baseFontSize
field.label: Base font size
field.description: Sets the base font size that all % and em based font declarations is based upon.

field.name: bodyFont
field.label: Body font family
field.description: Select google font to load a google font

option.value: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif
Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.option: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond serif

field.name: bodyFont_custom
field.label: Google Font - Body
field.description: Enter the google font you want to use on your site here. If the font name contains spaces just add the space as per the way it is described in the google font directory eg Source Sans pro

field.name: headingFont
field.label: Heading Font Family
field.description: Sets the font for all heading classes.

option.value: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

field.option: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

option.value: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.option: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

option.value: Garamond, Times New Roman, Times, serif

field.option: Garamond, Times New Roman, Times, serif

field.name: headingFont_custom
field.label: Google Font - Heading
field.description: Enter the google font you want to use on your site here. If the font name contains spaces just add the space as per the way it is described in the google font directory eg Source Sans pro

field.name: navFont
field.label: Nav Font
field.description: The font specified here will be applied to the main navigation on the site.

option.value: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

field.option: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

option.value: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.option: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.name: navFont_custom
field.label: Google Font - Nav
field.description: Enter the google font you want to use on your site here. If the font name contains spaces just add the space as per the way it is described in the google font directory eg Source Sans pro

field.name: customfont_enable
field.label: Enable custom font
field.description: When enabled the custom font and selector specified below will be used.

field.name: customfontselector
field.label: Selector to apply a custom font

field.name: customFont
field.label: Custom Font
field.description: The font specified here will be applied to the main navigation on the site.

option.value: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

field.option: Cambria, Georgia, Times, Times New Roman, serif

option.value: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.option: Adobe Caslon Pro, Georgia, Garamond, Times, serif

field.name: customFont_custom
field.label: Google Font - Custom
field.description: Enter the google font you want to use on your site here. If the font name contains spaces just add the space as per the way it is described in the google font directory eg Source Sans pro

field.name: customFontCSS
field.label: CSS to be applied to custom font
field.description: If you need to apply specific css to this custom font then apply it here. eg color:#fff;font-size:3em.

field.name: stickynavoffset
field.label: Stickynav offset
field.description: The distance fromt he top of the page that the user needs to scroll in order to trigger the sticky nav.

field.name: openpaneltext
field.label: Open Panel text
field.description: This setting determines the text used for the open panel text when you have any module piublished to the panel1, panel2, panel3 or panel4 positions.

field.name: copyright
field.label: Remove Copyright
field.description: Remove Joomlabamboo copyright and add your own?

field.name: onepage
field.label: One page design?
field.description: When enabled the links in the menu scroll to their correspoinding grid rows in the template.

field.name: homelink
field.label: Home link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the home link. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: bannerlink
field.label: Banner link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the banner row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: tabslink
field.label: Tabs link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the tabs row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid1link
field.label: Grid 1 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid1 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid2link
field.label: Grid 2 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid2 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid3link
field.label: Grid 3 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid3 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: mainlink
field.label: Main link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the Main row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid4link
field.label: Grid 4 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid4 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid5link
field.label: Grid 5 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid5 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: grid6link
field.label: Grid 6 link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the grid6 row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: bottomlink
field.label: Bottom link
field.description: Enter the text for the anchor that links to the bottom row. Leave this option empty if you would like to not link to this row.

field.name: customcopyright
field.label: Add custom copyright
field.description: Enter the custom copyright details for your site. HTML allowed.

field.name: ZEN_MAINBODY_DISABLED
field.description: This option hides any content that will normally render in the main body div including the main content, sidebars, above and below modules for the front page.
field.label: Remove mainbody output from homepage

field.name: minorborderColor
field.label: Border colour for lists and headings

field.name: dropdownLinkBorderColor
field.label: Border applied to items in sub menu

field.name: taglineLeft
field.label: Tagline left offset
field.description: This setting determines the left offset of the tagline. A -ve value here will move the tagline to the left while a +ve value will move it to the right.

field.name: taglineTop
field.label: Tagline top offset
field.description: This setting determines the left offset of the tagline. A -ve value here will move the tagline up while a +ve value will move it down.
